name: Rite of the Goddess
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2016. This is one of my favorite jam games, so I thought it deserved a page here. I really like this mechanic and maybe someday we will make a full game out of it!

--

Venture in The Temple, following dream-whispered and mysterious orders given from the Goddess herself... The ascension to the top floor of The Tower - the Sacred Room - is full of dangers and spirits of the dead; enemies of the Goddess that must be purged.

To defend themselves from vengeful spirits of the dead, each of the servants of the Goddess can perform purifying rites, using their magic candles. Think quickly! Place your candles on the map to perform the Rite of Cleansing: whenever three candles are placed on the stage, any enemies caught in its area are damaged.

--

Made with Processing
